Configuration.Name: Help
Configuration.Author: Dennis Grzegorzewski, Paul V. Galvin Libary, Illinois Institute of Technology, grzegozewski@iit.edu
Configuration.Description: Creates a tab labeled Help in any opened request window that creates a browser to display a web page that corresponds to the current status of the displayed request.

Setting.name: Help Location
Setting.Description: Location of Help pages on local file server
